title: Telecom Systems Lab
description: Basic digital telecommunications systems are examined in a laboratory setting using electronic modules, covering concepts such as modulation, channel coding, AWGN, eye diagrams, and BER. Credit will not be awarded for ECE 4612 and ECE 4602.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 3040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3043 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
